Module app.photoapplication
Package app.photoapplication.model

Class Album

java.lang.Object
app.photoapplication.model.Album
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Album extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an album containing photos.
Author:
Jimmy Han, Luthfi Jamal Mohamed
